metadata.title: CVE-2017-14239 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM6.0.0 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the (1) CompanyName, (2) CompanyAddress, (3) CompanyZip, (4)CompanyTown, (5) Fax, (6) EMail, (7) Web, (8) ManagingDirectors, (9) Note,(10) Capital, (11) ProfId1, (12) ProfId2, (13) ProfId3, (14) ProfId4, (15)ProfId5, or (16) ProfId6 parameter to htdocs/admin/company.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
